title: The Fourth Fiskars Village Art & Design Biennale Explores the Sense of Water
content:
Press Release | 26 February 2026 | For immediate release

The Fourth Fiskars Village Art & Design Biennale Explores the Sense of Water

The Fiskars Village Art & Design Biennale opens on 7 June 2026 and runs until the end of August. Now in its fourth edition, the international event for contemporary art, design and architecture once again brings a thought-provoking program to the historic ironworks village of Fiskars.

The exceptionally well-preserved village environment and the river that runs through the old ironworks provide a compelling setting for this year‚Äôs main exhibitions exploring the layered meanings and significances of water. As before, the program will be expanded through an open call.

title: Roomalaista moraalin rappiota kuvaavat Sallustiuksen klassikkoteokset Catilinan salaliitto ja Jugurthan sota puhuttelevat my√∂s nykyp√§iv√§n√§
content:

content:

title: Ny bok: Gr√§nser och gemenskap utforskar identitet och utanf√∂rskap
content:
Illusionen av ett gemensamt ‚Äùvi‚Äù skapar b√•de tillh√∂righet och tystnad. Antologin Gr√§nser och gemenskap granskar hur identiteter byggs upp och utmanas i Finland. Boken avsl√∂jar en sj√§lvbild som s√§llan eller aldrig har konfronterats med fr√•gor om rasism, rasifiering och diskriminering.

I den tv√§rvetenskapliga boken synligg√∂rs och utmanas invanda tankes√§tt kring den finlandssvenskhet som ofta framst√•r som sj√§lvklar. Forskarna synar fr√•gor som andrafiering, uteslutning, vitmedvetenhet och sj√§lvf√∂rst√•else bland annat via empiriska studier.
